sentence.text: De novo monoallelic mutations in the GNB1 gene, encoding a β subunit of heterotrimeric G proteins, cause a newly recognized disorder with the typical clinical picture of severe developmental delay/intellectual disability, hypotonia and extrapyramidal symptoms.
We describe another case of the condition with manifestations of cutaneous mastocytosis associated with a novel do novo mutation GNB1NM_001282539.1: c.230G AAAA T; p.(Gly77Val).
